algorithm_technique: Iterative simulation with bit manipulation and length tracking
problem_summary_simple: Find the k-th bit of a recursively defined binary string.
problem_summary_technical: Simulates string generation by tracking length and parity, using bitwise operations to find the k-th bit.
key_insights: The string generation has a recursive structure that can be exploited.
The middle element of Si is always '1' for i > 1.
The problem can be solved by observing the pattern of flips and positions without explicitly building the string.
